description: This file initializes a vector database, loads CSV documents with metadata into a knowledge base, and sets up an agent with specific filters to query the data, then prints a response.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing the LanceDB vector database, used for storing and retrieving vector data.

classes.name: CSVUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class managing a knowledge base loaded from CSV files accessible via URLs, with metadata filtering capabilities.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base, capable of performing searches and generating responses.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a CSV document from a URL into the knowledge base with associated metadata.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
